thread.title: Volvo breaks ground on $500M manufacturing plant in South Carolina
thread.title_full: Volvo breaks ground on $500M manufacturing plant in South Carolina

author: The Associated Press
title: Volvo breaks ground on $500M manufacturing plant in South Carolina
text:
Home / Brief / Volvo breaks ground on $500M manufacturing plant in South Carolina Volvo breaks ground on $500M manufacturing plant in South Carolina By: The Associated Press September 25, 2015 3:32 pm 0 RIDGEVILLE, S.C. — Volvo has broken ground on its first auto manufacturing plant in North America — a $500 million facility in Berkeley County about 30 miles northwest of Charleston. Volvo North American CEO Lex Kerssemakers announced Friday the plant will build the company's new S-60 sedan, a car under development in Sweden. Kerssemakers said the plant ...
